scripts.build-prev: babel src/index.js -o build/purelib.js && terser build/purelib.js -c -m keep_classnames -o build/purelib.min.js
scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.js && terser build/purelib.js -c -m keep_classnames -o build/purelib.min.js
scripts.build-tiny: babel src/index.js -o build/purelib.js && terser build/purelib.js -c -m reserved=['addClass'] -o build/purelib-new.min.js
